Accept Darkness.name: Accept Darkness
static_effect: Add +2 to all Brain Trauma rolls.

Barbaric.name: Barbaric
static_effect: All current and newborn survivors gain +1 permanent strength.

Cannibalize.name: Cannibalize
static_effect: When a survivor dies, draw 1 basic resource and add it to the settlement storage. Do not gain if a survivor is lost, ceases to exist, or is exiled.

Collective Toil.name: Collective Toil
static_effect: At the start of the settlement phase, gain +1[[Endeavor]] for every 10 population.

Graves.name: Graves
static_effect: When a survivor dies during the hunt or showdown, gain +2[[Endeavor]]
When a survivor dies during the settlement phase, gain +1[[Endeavor]].

Protect the Young.name: Protect the Young
static_effect: When rolling on the Intimacy story event, roll twice and pick 1 result.

Romantic-Arc.name: Romantic-Arc
static_effect: Add the Romanticism philosophy card to the philosophy deck.
Reduce the Lumi cost to learn knowledge at the Forum by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

Romantic.name: Romantic
static_effect: When you gain a random fighting art, draw 3, pick 1 instead.

Survival of the Fittest.name: Survival of the Fittest
static_effect: When rolling on the Intimacy story event, roll twice and pick the lowest result.
All current and newborn survivors gain +1 strength & +1 evasion.
Once per lifetime, a survivor may reroll a single roll result. They must keep the new result.
